content: this is a pattern produced for june cashmere please consider using the recommended yarn and supporting the company this is a beginner s friendly project that can be knitted over and over again for years to come it makes a wonderful gift and is a fantastic wardrobe staple that continually reminds us of the value and warmth of cashmere this hat is worked from the bottom rib to the crown in 2x2 rib then in a single broken rib this is a very simple pattern but it is both charted and written for ease of understanding this pattern requires a very accurate gauge as it uses almost to the last 10 centimetres 1 50 gram hank of dk weight june cashmere finished measurements rib to crown 24 5cm rib circumference unstretched 43cm can stretch up to 59cm
